extensionName.message: GPT Reader: Free AI Text to Speech with ChatGPT Voices, TTS

extensionDescription.message: Natural ChatGPT AI text to speech (TTS) for PDFs, articles, & docs. Download or read aloud using high-quality voices with GPT Reader

drag_and_drop_files.message: Drag 'n' Drop Files Here, or Click to Select File

upload_limit.message: You Can Upload a File Up to 24 MB

would_you_like_to_download_or_listen.message: Would you like to download or listen to the audio?

download_note.message: Subject to be behind a paywall in the future

please_wait_file_downloading.message: Please wait while the file is being downloaded...

full_download_note.message: If the file did not download automatically, please click the 'Download' button below.

gpt4_download_note.message: Dear ChatGPT premium users, ensure you use GPT-4o mini for the fastest speeds. Close the overlay to change models.

cancel_download_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?

accuracy_warning.message: GPT Reader may produce audio that is not 100% accurate. If you notice differences, close the overlay, open a new ChatGPT chat, and try again.

feedback_prompt.message: We are always looking for ways to improve. Please let us know what we can do better.

feedback_question.message: What do you think about this extension?

error_no_start.message: An error prevented the download from starting, please close the overlay to fix and try again

error_stopped_midway.message: The download stopped due to an error. Download the processed audio so far below.

cancel_download_confirmation_title.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?

cancel_download_confirmation_sr.message: Do you want to cancel the download?

note_partial_audio.message: Note: Click the download button above to download the portion processed so far.

gpt_reader_chunk_explanation.message: GPT Reader breaks large text into smaller chunks and sends them to ChatGPT. You may temporarily reach a rate limit. If so, please wait about an hour.

acknowledge_and_accept.message: By continuing, you acknowledge and accept this as part of using the extension.

offline_warning.message: You seem to be offline! Check your connection and try again!

slow_response_warning.message: GPT Reader is taking longer than usual. Close the overlay to check for errors. GPT-4 recommended.

voice_selector_description.message: Choose from a variety of ChatGPT-enhanced voices. Select before uploading text.

cannot_upload_one_file.message: Cannot upload more than 1 file at a time

chatgpt_issue.message: ChatGPT seems to be having issues; please check the website.

simplify_reading.message: Simplify reading long documents with GPT

ongoing_conversation_error.message: There is an ongoing conversation or you exceeded the hourly limit. Please wait and try later!

chat_error.message: ChatGPT may show an error or you've reached a limit. Check ChatGPT's site for details.

input_required_error.message: This is a required field (min 5 characters)

please_wait_previous.message: Please wait until the previous request completes

presence_confirmation_yes.message: Yes, I want to keep listening
